rows.label: tev001201_MSG0001
rows.name:
[ST:playername ]! Hey!
You heading off somewhere? Mind if I tag along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0002
rows.name:
I keep hitting dead ends with my Skell flight module
project, and it's making my brain start to hurt...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0003
rows.name:
I think a little BLADE work in the great outdoors would
be just the thing to clear my head. So how about it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001201_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Lin to your team.

rows.label: tev001201_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001201_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Lin's request for now.

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thanks, [ST:playername ]!
The fresh air will do me good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh, okay. I bet the mission's a real toughie, huh?
Well, thanks for looking out for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0010
rows.name: How's your Skell flight module holding up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'd love to see how it performs in the field...
Mind taking me with you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001201_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Lin to your team.

rows.label: tev001201_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001201_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Lin's request for now.

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0012
rows.name: Awesome! I'm so excited![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aww, all right. I guess I'll go make dinner then.
Come back if you get hungry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0018
rows.name:
I can't believe we're finally gonna get the Lifehold
Core back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'll do anything to make this work out, so take me
along, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thanks, [ST:playername ]!
You won't regret this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Aww, all right. Good luck out there, you hear?
Make sure you come back safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0026
rows.name:
Hey, you heading off again? I was just thinking
I could use a little adventure myself...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Come on, take me with you, okay? Please?
I'll go anywhere you want![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001201_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Lin to your team.

rows.label: tev001201_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001201_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Lin's request for now.

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0028
rows.name: Fantastic! Let's get this party started![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Fiiine. I'll just hang out at boring old home then.
But at least bring me back some fresh ingredients
to mess around with in the kitchen, okay?[ST:wait ]
